name: Hidden Object Mystery Games - For Kids

description:
Christmas Hidden Objects 2016 is fabulous Puzzle and adventure game for free

Happy New Year And Merry Christmas “christmas hidden object” games free for all this game is a help to santa cluse to clean all object in christmas party room cleaning.
Christmas is near Are you ready for the CHRISTMAS 2016 so now this games is Christmas party game for kids this game is a puzzle holiday games. now test your observation skills and let's see you can find all hidden objects from the all attractive christmas backgrounds!

Features

10 Different Attractive Background Level!
Search AllHidden Objects
Each level you have to find out 10 hidden objects ,which is challenging for you!
Hint is available for your help,if You can't find objects! Here we give Hints for Free.
